name: veiculo_tipo_id_marca_id_modelo
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool veiculos_api.
Tool description: Tabela FIPE - Busca por marca, modelo e vers√£o. Atualizado: 08/08/2023
API description: Sends a GET request to the veiculos API to retrieve vehicle information based on the type, brand, and model provided.

id_marca.description: The ID of the vehicle's brand.

id_modelo.description: The ID of the vehicle's model.

veiculo_tipo.description: The type of the vehicle (e.g., car, bike).
